text: George Hirst (1871–1954) was an English cricketer. George Hirst may also refer to: * George Harry Hirst (1879–1933), British politician * George Littlewood Hirst (1890–1967), Welsh rugby union player * George Hirst (virologist) (1909–1994), American virologist and science administrator * George Hirst (footballer) (born 1999) ==See also== * George Hurst (disambiguation)
title: George Hirst (disambiguation)
